trans-unit.source: Defines a workflow communication activity that is used to call a method on a local service.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un'attività di comunicazione del flusso di lavoro che viene utilizzata per chiamare un metodo in un servizio locale.

trans-unit.source: This activity is used to send data from the workflow to the host through the local service.
trans-unit.target: Questa attività viene utilizzata per inviare dati dal flusso di lavoro all'host tramite il servizio locale.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A local service is a class that implements a local service interface (an interface that is marked with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>) and is added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Un servizio locale è una classe che implementa un'interfaccia di servizio locale (un'interfaccia contrassegnata con <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>) e viene aggiunto a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the external method is called all parameters of the method are cloned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando il metodo esterno viene chiamato tutti i parametri del metodo vengono duplicati.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter types implement <xref:System.ICloneable> the `Clone` method is called or they are serialized and deserialized with a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: Se i tipi di parametro implementano <xref:System.ICloneable>il `Clone` metodo viene chiamato o essere serializzati e deserializzati con un <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> </xref:System.ICloneable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity, used to initialize the activity name property.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'attività, utilizzato per inizializzare la proprietà nome dell'attività definita dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref> for the external method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"> </xref> per il metodo esterno.

trans-unit.source: This property defines which specific <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> activity a given external method call comes from.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà definisce quali specifiche <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>attività proviene da una chiamata al metodo esterno specificato da.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>

trans-unit.source: This value can then be used in the payload of a local communication service event to direct that event to the correct <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore può quindi essere utilizzato nel payload di un evento del servizio di comunicazione locale per indirizzare tale evento per il corretto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>attività.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crexample](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] correlation, see the [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crexample](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]correlazione, vedere il [correlato di esempio di servizio locale](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).

trans-unit.source: The correlation token for the external method.
trans-unit.target: Il token di correlazione per il metodo esterno.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken*> property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken*>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Tries to run the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di eseguire il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"> </xref> con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> that contains the execution environment in which to run the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> che contiene l'ambiente di esecuzione in cui eseguire il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> è un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: executionContext is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: executionContextè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The service object for the executionContext is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto servizio per il executionContext è un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs initialization on dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'inizializzazione sulle proprietà di dipendenza.

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken%2A> property, verifies the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> properties are set and verifies that the event referenced in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> property can be found in the interface referenced in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo inizializza la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken%2A>proprietà, viene verificata la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A>siano impostate e verifica che l'evento a cui fa riferimento nel <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A>proprietà è disponibile nell'interfaccia di riferimento nel <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an external method's declaring interface that has the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un metodo esterno della dichiarazione di interfaccia con il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The external method's declaring interface that has the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo esterno di dichiarazione di interfaccia con il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType*> property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType*>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> property corresponds to the name of the interface that was marked with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A>proprietà corrisponde al nome dell'interfaccia che è stato contrassegnato con <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before invoking the method.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica prima di richiamare il metodo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking> event defines an event delegate that is executed before the activity invokes the external method on the local service.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking>evento definisce un delegato di evento che viene eseguito prima che l'attività richiama il metodo esterno nel servizio locale.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to be called on the local service registered with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del metodo da chiamare nel servizio locale si registrato con il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The method name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del metodo di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"> </xref> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName*>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> property corresponds to the name of a method contained on an interface that is marked with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A>proprietà corrisponde al nome del metodo contenuto in un'interfaccia contrassegnata con <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Provides a hook for derived classes to extract out and return values from the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un hook per le classi derivate per estrarre e restituire valori da <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called just after the external method is run.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato subito dopo l'esecuzione del metodo esterno.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati per il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"> </xref> evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Provides a hook for derived classes to set <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un hook per le classi derivate impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called just before the external method is run.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato appena prima di eseguita il metodo esterno.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati per il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"> </xref> evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of bindable parameters as found in the external method's formal parameter list.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di parametri associabili come disponibile nell'elenco di parametri formali del metodo esterno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection"></xref> of parameters to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection"> </xref> di parametri associabili.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*> property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Returns the access type for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il tipo di accesso per la proprietà specificata.

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzato in fase di compilazione per convalidare le proprietà sono associate correttamente uno a altro.

trans-unit.source: Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
trans-unit.target: Senza questa interfaccia queste informazioni vengono derivate direttamente dai getter/setter di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa <xref:System.IServiceProvider>per fornire accesso ai servizi in fase di progettazione se sono necessarie.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"> </xref> valore di enumerazione che indica il livello di accesso della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Type> of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref:System.Type>della proprietà specificata.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzato in fase di compilazione per convalidare le proprietà sono associate correttamente fra loro.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa <xref:System.IServiceProvider>per fornire accesso ai servizi in fase di progettazione se sono necessarie.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il per la proprietà il cui nome è passato come il propertyName parametro.
